char_1012_skadi2.name: Ancient Kin
char_1012_skadi2.desc: Can summon a Seaborn that lasts for 15 seconds. The Seaborn's Attack Range is treated as an extension of Skadi's Attack Range

char_1012_skadi2.name: Ancient Kin
char_1012_skadi2.desc: Can summon a Seaborn that lasts for 25 seconds. The Seaborn's Attack Range is treated as an extension of Skadi's Attack Range

char_1012_skadi2.name: Predatory Habits
char_1012_skadi2.desc: If there are allies within Skadi or the Seaborn's Attack Range, self ATK +6%;</br></br>If the allies are [Abyssal Hunters] operators, self ATK +15% instead

char_1012_skadi2.name: Predatory Habits
char_1012_skadi2.desc: If there are allies within Skadi or the Seaborn's Attack Range, self ATK +9% (+3%);</br></br>If the allies are [Abyssal Hunters] operators, self ATK +18% (+3%) instead

char_003_kalts.name: Mon3tr
char_003_kalts.desc: Can summon and heal Mon3tr. Mon3tr has 35 seconds redeployment time. Kal'tsit will prioritize healing self and Mon3tr. If not within Kal'tsit's Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0

char_003_kalts.name: Mon3tr
char_003_kalts.desc: Can summon and heal Mon3tr. Mon3tr has 30 seconds redeployment time. Kal'tsit will prioritize healing self and Mon3tr. If not within Kal'tsit's Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0

char_003_kalts.name: Mon3tr
char_003_kalts.desc: Can summon and heal Mon3tr. Mon3tr has 25 seconds redeployment time. Kal'tsit will prioritize healing self and Mon3tr. If not within Kal'tsit's Attack Range, Mon3tr's DEF is reduced to 0

char_003_kalts.name: Non-Damaging Restructuring
char_003_kalts.desc: When Mon3tr is defeated (excludes retreat), Stun all enemies within the 8 surrounding tiles for 3 seconds and deal 1200 True damage to them

char_003_kalts.name: Non-Damaging Restructuring
char_003_kalts.desc: When Mon3tr is defeated (excludes retreat), Stun all enemies within the 8 surrounding tiles for 3.5 (+0.5) seconds and deal 1400 (+200) True damage to them

char_474_glady.name: Waves of Aegir
char_474_glady.desc: When deployed, all [Abyssal Hunters] operators recover 1.5% Max HP every second and receive 15% less Physical and Arts damage from [Seaborn] enemies

char_474_glady.name: Waves of Aegir
char_474_glady.desc: When deployed, all [Abyssal Hunters] operators recover 2.5% Max HP every second and receive 25% less Physical and Arts damage from [Seaborn] enemies

char_474_glady.name: Survival of the Fittest
char_474_glady.desc: When attacking enemies with weight <= 3, deal 130% damage

char_474_glady.name: Survival of the Fittest
char_474_glady.desc: When attacking enemies with weight <= 3, deal 136% (+6%) damage
